### Identify relevant live tests for the Tree Action Decider Workflow to verify lambda connectivity and system functionality.

Identify the relevant live tests for the Tree Action Decider Workflow to ensure the lambda can be hit and the overall system still works. The workflow has various tests, some mock and some live.
